title: Wanna. SpartanSex Spermax!!!
synopsis: Based on the erotic game by Guilty eX. Tanabe Yoshiyuki disappeared and it was discovered he was bullied in school. Nagisa, Yoshiyuki's cousin, decided to dress up as a male in order to find out what happened to him and to exact revenge on those responsible for the bullying. (Source: HentaiTake)
